patterns: does the college have library facility
responses:
S.K. Somaiya College Library aims to serve the needs of students, faculty and staff members of the library. The library is located in the Aungier Street building and is spread across two floors over 835 sq. mtr., with a seating capacity for more than 100 students. the main library is located on the third floor Reference section and Reading area (493sq.m.) of the institutional building and Circulation Section (342sq.m.) is located on the first floor of the building.

For more information visit here
